The fabric is stretchy, thick enough to hide annything worn underneath, comfortable, and the cut is extremely flattering.
I loved the dress. And it stretches to your size even if you have gained weight. 2 thumbs up. 👍👍
it fit well! and the material lasts

Fits perfect and so comfortable. I love this dress!
On time

Velvet/velor fabric is a nice wer. Color is very much like portrayed. Imy size runs all over the place between XL -1X depending on manufacturer (5'1", 165lbs). I chose a 2X based on measurement guide. Perfect fit. Creates a beautiful silhouette of an hourglass figure. Fun swirl of the skirt. Downside: the neckline of.the dress isn't sewn down. As a result, the fabric slips out from the crease wrecking the neckline. For me, it's an easy fix with "stich witchery" but I shouldn't have to do that". The other con (for me personally) is that the neckline on the back of the dress and shoulders are wide enough that I will need to purchase a different bra so my straps don't show. Overall, I'm happy with it. Its a classicstyle that can be made retro or current simply by pairing with the desired accessories. 😁
I really enjoyed wearing this dress. It is very well made, for perfectly and a rich color. Made me feel special.

Bought this dress, with a bit of reluctance.  Wasn’t sure of its quality or fit.  Alas, it arrived, nice fabric with substance and fit perfect. I’m small and extra small at times.  Pleasantly surprised and happy with my purchase.

The dress fits perfectly, I ordered next size up . I am busty the stretch is just tight. I will be be dressed up as Barbie for Halloween so it will be perfect. The color is pale pink… wished it was a little brighter pink.
COLOR: DEEP Dark Red Classic A-Line ELASTICITY: has just enough stretchiness that true velvet has. Not too heavy.

This is my second buy from GownTown, and won't be my last! The dress has a slight stretch to it that makes it just that more comfortable. I did order a size up from what I normally would, and the fit is perfect. PLUS POCKETS?! I've always loved the 50's swing style dresses but they've almost never come in my size (let's face it, I'm 5'10" and built like a tank). Now I've found these, and I will keep buying more! ❤️

Hard to find this length of dress.  I have similar dresses and I like their weird, stretchy fabric, very comfortable.  It’s all I love, 3/4 sleeves, longer length and pockets. I’m 180,  5’3” and 3XL fit perfect.  I don’t wear clothes that are too small that seems to be the trend these days,
The quality is terrible. The dress is extremely wrinkled. It’s really cute but I would have to take it to dry cleaning.

This dress looks so pretty in person! I bought the blue velvet, which is more like a dark teal or peacock blue. It looks gorgeous and is so flattering on me. It is just the tiniest bit too small on me, so I suggest sizing up if you're on the bustier side. Still though, I will definitely be wearing this to formal events. I am 6ft and this hits right around my knees if you're taller than average.
I am 110lbs and 5'3", bought small. This is little small for my size. Hopefully it will not shrink when I wash. The dress is very lovely.

I work in high school and bought this dress for graduation event. I bought it at the last minute, and hope to fit. It fit like a glove! It was comfortable, a great weight fabric, flared just right at the waist, and had pockets. I would definitely buy another dress just like this!
Ran a little small to me.
The color is pretty and I got so many compliments on this dress. Fits true to size and is very comfortable.  Definitely would buy in more colors.

Super cute dress, the velvet is really soft and it even has pockets. I ordered a small. I’m 5’2” 104lbs. The only issue is this is NOT made for small chested girls. I have nothing to fill out the bust of the dress so it just looks like extra loose fabric where boobs are supposed to be. Would fit a lot better if you had at least something, ya know? A small should fit like a small in all the spaces, chest included. Or at least include extra small sizes??? Maybe just maybe? I see so much inclusion for plus sizes but not for petites. And not only with this specific dress, all over the clothing industry. The sizes go from small to XXXL but they can’t even have ONE extra small option?  Why include one side of the spectrum but not the other? Since when does a small fit like a medium? If I needed a medium I would’ve ordered that. Either include extra small sizes or make a small TRULY a small.
The dress was beautiful, unfortunately it did not fit
Beautiful dress. But item was in a transparent plastic bag that was not completely closed. It should be in a package!
Love it

I have now boughten 4 dresses from this company. The fit is amazing. I wear a medium, I'm 5 ft 8 and 160. It is so flattering and I have received many compliments . It is stretchy fabric yet durable and most of all comfy and cute.

评论概述: Color is different in item photo than actual dress
评论详情: The dress itself is sewn and made pretty good.  Ive seen better but Ive also seen far worse quality from amazon sellers. It seems to have a really good shape and fit. If it was the color shown and ordered I'd  have given 5 stars. The issue is that the color of the light blue is more of what I'd consider the color of hospital scrubs that have been washed and faded over time. Its nowhere near as cheery and bright as the stock photo. Seller was polite and prompt to return my messages. I eventually bought one that was the color needed and gave this to a neighbor.
Really pretty. I'd be fine wearing it to any TLM service.
Gorgeous color, easy to launder.

This dress is exactly what I excepted. It really fit nice and I really liked this dress. The only reason I had to return it, because I ordered another dress.  It came around the same time this one came so I compared the two dresses. So the other dress won and it had more detail and I kept it.  Furthermore this dress is very nice fitting and just like it appeared on line.

My wife was wanting some flattering plus-sized dresses for church.  I found Gown Town, and my wife and daughters love the vintage look.  It fits my wife perfectly.  This is the second dress I've bought her from Gown Town.  Will definitely buy more.

I purchased this for my daughter. It fits perfectly. She loves it because it has pockets. She wears it with a petticoat and ballet flats. The material doesn’t wrinkle easily and is thick enough that she can avoid wearing a slip. True to size and description.

I love it and it fits as I dreamed it would.

评论概述: Beautiful Dress+  Cheapass Zipper = Bad Review
评论详情: Bought this to wear to a wedding. Tried it on once,  it fit perfectly and looked great. A few weeks later, as  I was getting dressed and for the wedding I put it on, the  the zipper broke from the bottom. The,  zipper moved up, but, as it was unattached at the bottom, it left a gap as the zipper moved up, leaving me scrambling for something else to wear at the last minute. My "window" has closed on the time I could leave return it, so much for planning ahead. So stupid to make such a pretty dress and scrimp on something as important aw the zipper. I guess I should be glad it was so chintzy a zipper that it broke before I got the chance to even wear the dress once, or it would have happened at the wedding. But seriously folks, do some quality control before you ruin someone else's evening.
Beautiful and elegant!

I absolutely love how this dress is machine washable, has pockets, is a modest past the knees church dress. (I don't have a picture of this particular one, but of the pink plaid with the nap tie. In these pictures I weighed in the 145-155 pounds range, I have since gained weight and the dresses still fit me very well, as I got them loose fitting in the size medium and large to account for weight gain or lose.)
